original: 揚州吳郡人，全琮次子。全寄為魯王孫霸黨羽，參與二宮之爭，詆毀誹謗太子黨。最後太子孫和被廢，魯王孫霸及其黨羽盡被賜死，全寄亦在其中。
text: Wu Jun, Yangzhou, the second son of Quan Cong. Quan Ji is a gang member of King Lu and Sun Ba, who participated in the Second House dispute and slandered the princeling. In the end, the crown prince and grandson were abolished, and the king of Lu and his gang members were given to death, and all were sent to them.
